DOC.brief_summary: In general , diagnosis back pain break three major category : Mechanical ( Osteoarthritis , Spinal stenosis , Spondylolisthesis ) ; Non- mechanical ( Tumor , Infection , Inflammatory arthritis ) Miscellaneous ( Osteoporosis , Psychosomatic disorder , neuropathic joint , visceral disease ) . Although 98 % LBP may cause mechanical factor , 2 % caused malignancy , infection , visceral disease red herring must consider seriously . The investigator observe practice lateral pressure 5th lumbar vertebra sometimes give rise cervicothoracic pain central PA pressure cervicothoracic spine reproduce original low back leg pain . So question arises whether Cervico-thoracic dysfunction associate low back pain without radiation low extremity ?
DOC.brief_title: Most People With Low Back Pain Have Associated Cervicothoracic Musculoskeletal Dysfunction : Observational Study
